snippet: Most jobs in our globalized economy require ever increasing skills. But the skill set of the American work force has improved little. In math ability, not only are American workers less skilled than those from most other rich nations, but the young...
lead_paragraph: Most jobs in our globalized economy require ever increasing skills. But the skill set of the American work force has improved little. In math ability, not only are American workers less skilled than those from most other rich nations, but the young are even less skilled than the rest.

keywords.value: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
keywords.name: organizations
